welcome_message_body: "Welcome to American Fork, where small-town charm meets big adventures! Known for its stunning nature, delicious local cuisine and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Provo Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Provo Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles domestic flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Handles international flights and some domestic flights for smaller airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Handles regional flights for smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
